result.title: How to achieve 2000rating (5star) on codeforce
result.content: I am graduate student and I had started codeforces about a month ago my current rating around 1300 also my max rating was 1459 at starting . I am a quick learner and also i can practice hard. i want a smart way to reach 2000 rating quickly. I may dedicate approx 10 hrs of coding and learning per day. Please suggest me how should i go forward. thanks in Advance.
